page.title: 18Pentwyn Community Centre
page.content: The Community Centre is mainly for people in Pentwyn.700 people come to the Community Centre a week,100 in a day.The South Glamorgan Futher Education Department owns and finances the Community Centre.They have a youth group there,and they go on trips.The furthest they have ever been is Denmark.They have one mini-bus for transport.The head of the Community Centre is Mr.Williams.He organises the entire centre.Every week-day morning there is a play group and on Saturday and Sunday there is table tennis and Christian fellowship.Every afternoon there is mothers and toddlers except for Friday which is playgroup.On Saturday and Sunday there are usually parties.In the evening there are Youth Clubs,Computer Courses,Scouts, Brownies and Guides.
